hackathon-rules:
-No alcoholic beverages, drug usage, or smoking is allowed
-No smoking within 20 feet of the building.


-You may brainstorm projects before HackHolyoke, however you cannot submit projects completed prior to HackHolyoke. Anything you submit must be purely the work completed within the allotted time limit. 
-You must be a current undergraduate student in order to be eligible for prizes.
-Must be original works from the hackers (You may brainstorm ideas and make plans prior)
-Use of API’s and open source material is allowed


-Be kind to others. Do not insult or put down other attendees.
- Behave professionally. 
- Harassment of any sort is prohibited. Harassment includes, offensive verbal comments related to gender, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, religion, sexual images in public spaces, deliberate intimidation, stalking, following, harassing photography or recording, sustained disruption of talks or other events, inappropriate physical contact, and unwelcome sexual attention. (Remember we are an all-inclusive community and want everyone to feel welcome and safe!)

HAVE FUN! Take this time to be innovative, get to meet really cool people, and learn something new.

**Attendees violating these rules may be asked to leave the Hackathon at the sole discretion of the Hackathon organizers. Thank you for helping make this a welcoming, friendly event for all!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment. Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Win HackHarassment Swag Bag.

Everything is part of the internet of things now - from your phone to your fitness band to your thermostat. Build a hack that utilizes private data being collected from your devices, and show how you can turn potential vulnerabilities into something constructive. Prize: Collector's Edition of Watch Dogs 2
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Watch Dogs® 2 Best Device Privacy Hack
Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Go Pros, Indico API Credit, .tech domains
